text:
Hello everyone,
I'm Michael Chovanak, a 3rd year Computer Science undergrad at Grinnell College. I am interested in computer graphics, and I am currently attempting to make a game engine using JuliaGL.
Thanks in advance for any guidance!

text: I appreciate the video! And GameZero.jl seems like a great reference source, although I am planning for my engine to be 3D.
